actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.
Committee on Finance requested executive comment from OMB, Treasury Department.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to allow individuals to compute the amount of the deduction for retirement savings on the basis of the compensation of the spouse.

summary.text: Homemakers' Equity Act - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow individuals to compute the amount of the deduction for retirement savings on the basis of the compensation of the spouse. Phases this deduction in over a period of seven years.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to allow individuals to compute the amount of the deduction for retirement savings on the basis of the compensation of the spouse.
